entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
